response.overview: Yudi: The Jinn of Yedikonuk is about a family that finds themselves in great danger because of the magic they have cast. Serdar is a retired doctor living in Cyprus with his wife Nur and son Onur. Even though the family tried all kinds of treatment methods for Onur, who was disabled as a result of a traffic accident, they could not reach a solution. Nur, who made a water spell to restore her son, causes the dangerous djinn tribe, who has pledged allegiance to Yudi, to haunt her family. The two heavens must come together in order for the family to get rid of the jinn tribe that haunts them.
response.title: Yudi: Yedikonuk Cinleri
